content: this holiday gift bag is a quick knit that will dress up even the simplest of gifts the bag requires only one 2 5 ounce skein of cotton you can even do a combination of colors to use up scrap yarn or use more yarn and make the bag taller by adding more repeats of the lace i m using one bag as a yarn-cozy i have a stitch counter attached to the outside while the yarn cake rests inside protected from rolling around
